definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="String" id="password">password</variable><variable type="String" id="email">email</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">ApiUserManagement user_api=new ApiUserManagement();</field><next><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:email</field><value name="VAL"><block type="get_command_parameter_string"><field name="param">email</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:password</field><value name="VAL"><block type="get_command_parameter_string"><field name="param">password</field></block></value><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">ApiResponse message = user_api.getPlayerByLogin(email,password);</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">message.getCode()==200</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">"id player logged: "+  message.getResponse().toString()</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">"ยง4Error: "+message.getErrorDescription()</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
